mdRecord.dcterms:title: Doctor's bag
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Leather bag contains instruments and measures about 14" x 8.5" x 7" when open. Contains a speculum, lamp, 4 syringes in metal cases with rubber stoppers, 2 empty metal cases with stoppers, a pelvimeter, and a Bright-Line Haemacytometer with pipettes in a red case. The Haemacytometer case is marked with the initials G M H.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bags
Medical instruments and apparatus
